about_the_game:
Welcome to Daahrien's Active and Operational, where survival hangs in the balance aboard a ship teeming with androids, monsters, and zombies. Prepare to be plunged into a world of terror where every moment could be your last.

In this chilling horror experience, you'll find yourself trapped in the confines of a forsaken vessel, surrounded by two androids that may not be as friendly as they seem. But they're not your only concern. The ship is infested with grotesque monsters and relentless zombies, all hell-bent on making you their next victim.

To escape the nightmare, you'll need more than just luck on your side. Daahrien's Active and Operational features a host of cool mechanics designed to keep you on the edge of your seat. From stealthy hide-and-seek gameplay to nerve-wracking tasks that test your courage, every moment is a fight for survival.

Do you have what it takes to outsmart your enemies, uncover the secrets of the ship, and make it out alive?

content_descriptors.notes: Specially designed to be HORRIFYING. Not for the faint of heart.

detailed_description:
Welcome to Daahrien's Active and Operational, where survival hangs in the balance aboard a ship teeming with androids, monsters, and zombies. Prepare to be plunged into a world of terror where every moment could be your last.

In this chilling horror experience, you'll find yourself trapped in the confines of a forsaken vessel, surrounded by two androids that may not be as friendly as they seem. But they're not your only concern. The ship is infested with grotesque monsters and relentless zombies, all hell-bent on making you their next victim.

To escape the nightmare, you'll need more than just luck on your side. Daahrien's Active and Operational features a host of cool mechanics designed to keep you on the edge of your seat. From stealthy hide-and-seek gameplay to nerve-wracking tasks that test your courage, every moment is a fight for survival.

Do you have what it takes to outsmart your enemies, uncover the secrets of the ship, and make it out alive?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu Equivalent Distro
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-3210
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Any 8 years old PC will do.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu Equivalent Distro
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2070
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Any 4 years old PC will do.

name: Daahrien's Active and Operational

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 / Windows® 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-3210
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Any 8 years old PC will do.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 / Windows® 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Any 4 years old PC will do.

short_description: Daahrien's Active and Operational is a Scifi Horror game set in an abandoned space ship. After activating the dormant A.I. there, escaping it has become your top priority.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
